content: this little banana i designed for chuck the monkey pattern by deliciouscrochet that i ve made some days ago it s worked in *one piece* because i don t like joining parts enjoy **skills level intermediate ** not suitable for beginners **languages at choice ** 1 german 2 english us crochet terms visit the english version of my blog for download a **french** translation of this pattern is available here http //stecolargol over-blog com/article-frecinette-pour-sa-dinette-49348921 html **copyright ** *all rights reserved * you may not re sell or re distribute this pattern including but not limited to translations to other languages and publishing on the internet you may not sell the finished figures or use pattern for any commercial purposes ----- ***where you can find me *** ---------------------------- my website/blog www esbelotta com 1 my dawanda shop 3 1 www esbelotta com 3 http //esbelotta dawanda com
